description: The Runbold Light Pants are long pants for hikes on hot summer days. The lightweight and stretchable material sits pleasantly on your skin without causing perspiration. These versatile pants are ideal for a wide range of occasions, from a Sunday hike to a demanding multi-day tour. They can be rolled up slightly and easily converted to ¾-length pants. Pre-shaped knees and a partially elasticated waistband make them feel very comfortable. They are also water-repellent – ideal for changeable weather. The hiking pants feature two slit pockets with zippers and a seat pocket that can be used to pack the pants up in. Compressed for packing, they will fit in any backpack.
name: Mammut Runbold Light Pants, Short - Mens
